010package imagingbook.common.color.edge;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013
014import ij.plugin.filter.Convolver;
015import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
016import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack;
018import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
019import imagingbook.common.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
020import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
021
022/**
023 * <p>
024 * Monochromatic color edge detector.
025 * See Sec. 16.2 of [1] for additional details (Alg. 16.1).
026 * </p>
027 * <p>
028 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic Approach</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
029 * </p>
030 * 
031 * @author W. Burger
032 * @version 2014/02/16
033 * @version 2022/09/04 converted to implement interface
034 */
035public class MonochromaticEdgeDetector implements ColorEdgeDetector {
036        
037        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
038                /** Specify which color distance to use */
039                public NormType norm = NormType.L2;
040        }
041
042        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
043        private final Parameters params;
044        private final int M;    // image width
045        private final int N;    // image height
046        private final FloatProcessor Emag;      // edge magnitude map
047        private final FloatProcessor Eort;      // edge orientation map
048
049        // Sobel-kernels for x/y-derivatives:
050        private static final float[] HxS = Matrix.multiply(1.0f/8, new float[] {
051                        -1, 0, 1,
052                    -2, 0, 2,
053                    -1, 0, 1
054                    });
055    
056        private static final float[] HyS = Matrix.multiply(1.0f/8, new float[] {
057                        -1, -2, -1,
058                         0,  0,  0,
059                         1,  2,  1
060                         });
061
062        public MonochromaticEdgeDetector(ColorProcessor cp) {
063                this(cp, new Parameters());
064        }
065        
066        public MonochromaticEdgeDetector(ColorProcessor cp, Parameters params) {
067                this.params = params;
068                this.M = cp.getWidth();
069                this.N = cp.getHeight();
070                this.Emag = new FloatProcessor(M, N);
071                this.Eort = new FloatProcessor(M, N);
072                findEdges(cp);
073        }
074        
075        private void findEdges(ColorProcessor cp) {
076                FloatProcessor[] I = new PixelPack(cp).getFloatProcessors();
077            FloatProcessor[] Ix = new FloatProcessor[3];
078            FloatProcessor[] Iy = new FloatProcessor[3];
079            
080            Convolver conv = new Convolver();
081                conv.setNormalize(false);
082                for (int k = 0; k < 3; k++) {
083                        Ix[k] = I[k];
084                        Iy[k] = (FloatProcessor) Ix[k].duplicate();
085                        conv.convolve(Ix[k], HxS, 3, 3);
086                        conv.convolve(Iy[k], HyS, 3, 3);
087                }
088                
089                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
090                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
091                                // extract the gradients of the R, G, B channels:
092                                double rx = Ix[0].getf(u, v), ry = Iy[0].getf(u, v);
093                                double gx = Ix[1].getf(u, v), gy = Iy[1].getf(u, v);
094                                double bx = Ix[2].getf(u, v), by = Iy[2].getf(u, v);
095                                
096                                double er2 = sqr(rx) + sqr(ry);
097                                double eg2 = sqr(gx) + sqr(gy);
098                                double eb2 = sqr(bx) + sqr(by);
099                                
100                                // assign local edge magnitude:
101                                Emag.setf(u, v, (float) Math.sqrt(er2 + eg2 + eb2));
102                                
103                                // find the maximum gradient channel:
104                                double e2max = er2, cx = rx, cy = ry;   // assume red is the max channel
105                                
106                                if (eg2 > e2max) {
107                                        e2max = eg2; cx = gx; cy = gy;          // green is the max channel
108                                }
109                                if (eb2 > e2max) {
110                                        e2max = eb2; cx = bx; cy = by;          // blue is the max channel
111                                }
112                                
113                                // calculate edge orientation for the maximum channel:
114                                Eort.setf(u, v, (float) Math.atan2(cy, cx));
115                        }
116                }
117        }
118        
119        @Override
120        public FloatProcessor getEdgeMagnitude() {
121                return Emag;
122        }
123
124        @Override
125        public FloatProcessor getEdgeOrientation() {
126                return Eort;
127        }
128        
129}
